channel.title: Trips on Aliens in the Apple
channel.description: Recent content in Trips on Aliens in the Apple

item.title: The rest of the summer
item.description: (This post is pretty heavy on photos. Just a reminder that if you want to see larger versions of them, to click on a photo and you’ll then be able to view the slideshow of that particular group of photos.

item.title: Roadtrip ’16: Six Flags
item.description: For the last leg of our roadtrip home, we made a stop at Six Flags in the south of New Jersey. They have a program called Read To Succeed where the kids have to read a total of 600 hours in the year to get free tickets to Six Flags.

item.title: Roadtrip ’16: Camping in TN
item.description: After our visit to Monticello we started the drive down to Cherokee National Forest in east Tennessee where we planned on camping for a couple of nights. We started off in the rain and the rain just got heavier and heavier, and there were predictions for a huge storm to pass over where we were going to camp that night.
